sentence.Network_en: There is concern that police use the law to confiscate assets from people who have committed minor offences.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人担心警方利用该法罚没犯下轻罪的人的财产。

sentence.Network_en: Make maximum use of legislation to confiscate the proceeds of drug trafficking.
sentence.Network_cn: 善用现行法律以充公贩毒得益.

sentence.Network_en: The police have the right to confiscate any forbidden objects they find.
sentence.Network_cn: 如发现违禁货物,警方有权查扣.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(二)|联想记忆法背单词 ... confirm v. 证实，确认 confiscate v. 没收，充公 confound v. 迷惑；使糊涂.
举字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 祭祀〖 offersacrifice〗 没收〖 confiscate〗 吃丰盛的饮食〖 haveasquaremeal〗.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... fiscal 财政的 confiscate 没收，把---充公 fissure 裂缝，分裂.
张红岩 - 豆丁网 ... fine n. 罚款,罚金,晴天 confiscate vt. 没收,充公,查抄 seize vt. 俘获,掌握,扣押.

list.abs: ...(ii)有人在身体或心理上受严重伤害或有人有受该等伤害的相当程度的危险；或(iii)有人严重丧失自由；“没收令”(confiscation order) 指根据第8(7)条发出的命令；“享有法律特权的品目”(items subject to legal privilege) 指─.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin confiscat- 'put away in a chest, consigned to the public treasury', from the verb confiscare, based on con- 'together' + fiscus 'chest, treasury'

entry.def: If you confiscate something from someone, you take it away from them, usually as a punishment.

example.ex: There is concern that police use the law to confiscate assets from people who have committed minor offences...
example.tran: 有人担心警方利用该法罚没犯下轻罪的人的财产。

example.ex: They confiscated weapons, ammunition and propaganda material.
example.tran: 他们没收了武器、弹药和宣传材料。

means.word_mean: 1. take temporary possession of as a security, by legal authority;

sentences.sentence: "The customs agents impounded the illegal shipment"

means.word_mean: 2. taken without permission or consent especially by public authority;

sentences.sentence: "the condemned land was used for a highway cloverleaf"
"the confiscated liquor was poured down the drain"

auth_sentence.content: They all asked, 'Would the government confiscate the goods?
auth_sentence.res_content: They all asked, 'Would the government confiscate the goods?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They all asked, 'Would the government confiscate the goods?

auth_sentence.content: You can confiscate every penny from the likes of Buffet and Golub.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can confiscate every penny from the likes of Buffet and Golub.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can confiscate every penny from the likes of Buffet and Golub.

auth_sentence.content: Planning chiefs are to confiscate the land to allow public access to the beach.
auth_sentence.res_content: Planning chiefs are to confiscate the land to allow public access to the beach.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Planning chiefs are to confiscate the land to allow public access to the beach.

sentences.en: The teacher confiscated my radio because I was playing it in the classroom.
sentences.cn: 我在教室里玩收音机, 因此老师把它没收了。

jushi.english: The teacher confiscated my radio because I was playing it in the classroom.
jushi.chinese: 我在教室里玩收音机，因此老师把它没收了。
